casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Torrance Capree MIMS. No. 132P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2006 by Defendant for Petition for Plain Error Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
